issue.title: Ergonomic design of the leak detector and repair tool

content.raw:
In general, this competition is not meant to be easy.

R5 is capable of grasping the tools.

The tools have different shapes and textures. We won't add additional color coding.

The texture and shape of each tool already indicate the tool's alignment.

The tools do lay in their side.

I would say the tools are human and robot friendly.

You will have to figure out a solution to use each tool effectively, without osrf modifying the tool to make the problem easier.
